ISSUE.TITLE: Rental date used only mm/dd/yy format and cannot use dd/mm/yy
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.1 Steps to reproduce the problem: Create a rental product Set nopCommerce culture to use a culture with date format like "dd/mm/yy" Go to the product detail page and update the starting and ending rental date The date format is using mm/dd/yy format and cannot use dd/mm/yy It seems that the date format is hardcoded in the view _RentalInfo.cshtml: //currenly we support only this format //java-script format const string datePickerFormat = "mm/dd/yy"; //C# format for ToString method const string datePickerFormat2 = "MM/dd/yyyy"; Why this limitation ? Any workaround ? It is a huge limitation to be able to us this feature only in countries using this date format: mm/dd/yy Also see https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/3773, https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/5017
